name: socket-emotes
description: A live emote app powered by WebSockets âš¡
author: Dheeraj Mahra <dheeraj.mahra@cars24.com>

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && yarn --frozen-lockfile install" "cd server && yarn --frozen-lockfile install"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && yarn build" "cd client && yarn build"
